turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I can actually send order with Bella Luna Pizzeria.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Want to get three medium pizzas veggie lovers if they have. If not, just have have put vegetables on broccoli.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: tomatoes and carrots, and they all need to be extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, they have a veggie lovers specialty pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, let's get three three medium of those with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, there is an additional charge for extra cheese, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $60, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like pick-up, delivery, or dine-in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm going to pick it up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your receipt will be texted to you and your order will be ready in 30 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's it today, I appreciate your help.
